data.title: Rolling Storm Damage Reports: Tornado, Large Hail, High Wind in the Past 24 Hours
data.meta_description: Tornado, large hail and high wind in the U.S. in the past 24 hours
data.text: Aug. 12, 2024 1:55 a.m. CDT594 SSE BlackwellKay County, OK(OUN) Aug. 11, 2024 10:45 p.m. MST7410 S SaffordGraham County, AZPersonal weather station from trained spotter.
